com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu

类 MaterialMenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu.MaterialMenuView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, MaterialMenu

    public class MaterialMenuView
extends android.view.View
implements MaterialMenu
    A basic View wrapper of MaterialMenuDrawable. Used for custom view ActionBar or other layouts
